Class PileBase.CardBaseIterator

java.lang.Object
edu.wit.scds.ds.lists.app.card_game.universal_base.pile.PileBase.CardBaseIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<CardBase>, ListIterator<CardBase>
Enclosing class:
PileBase
private class PileBase.CardBaseIterator extends Object implements ListIterator<CardBase>
enable iteration over all cards in the pile
Version:
1.0 2021-12-08 Initial implementation, 2.0 2025-03-26
  • change to abstract class so games must be built with appropriate subclasses of Pile
  • remove no-arg constructor
, 3.0 2025-03-30
  • switch from ArrayList to LinkedList to improve efficiency to add/remove at both ends of the list (top and bottom) with O(1) efficiency
  • remove initial capacity argument from constructor - no longer needed/relevant
  • major cleanup and restructuring
  • move shuffle() here from Deck
  • support iteration
, 4.0 2025-06-26
  • track changes to other classes to support different types of card decks
  • move standard playing deck-specific methods to Pile
  • add various constructors and methods
  • make most instance methods fluent
, 5.0 2025-07-12
  • rename from Pile to UniversalBasePile for consistency with Card
  • add null-argument checking
  • add methods to manipulate the default orientation
  • support AS-IS default orientation
  • rename some methods to improve consistency
  • add tooling to optionally restrict cards based upon their persistence
, 6.0 2025-11-02 rename from UniversalBasePile to PileBase - less of a mouthful, 6.1 2025-11-19
  • add template card support
  • prevent clearing a pile unless it only contains temporary cards
, 6.2 2025-11-19 add support for verification of decks that they have the correct contents, typically at the end of a game to determine if any cards have been lost
Author:
Dave Rosenberg
